name: Multi-factor Authentication option appears in Profile Settings when enabled

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)

inline.description:
Multi-factor Authentication
————————————————————————————
1. Set "Enable Multi-factor Authentication" to true
2. Save
3. Switch back to a team, and observe the Profile Settings > Security tab
inline.expectedResult: Setting is saved. Under Profile Settings > Security, the Multi-factor Authentication setting appears, and you can click through to the setup page.
